name: Increment Save
description:
My project for Wann x Yam Game Jam 2022 with the theme "combination". My entry will be a combination of Idle Game and Working Simulator.  In this game you will play a boss micromanaging his/her staff.  

Credits:

Developed by Daniel Wichterich.
